ThankYouPage.title: Thank You for Contributing!
ThankYouPage.main_message: Your survey response has been successfully submitted and is now part of our comprehensive AI career impact database. You're helping create the most accurate picture of how AI is transforming the job market.
ThankYouPage.step_1_description: Your responses are being processed alongside thousands of others to generate industry insights.
ThankYouPage.step_2_description: Our AI analyzes the data to create personalized reports for your specific career and location.
ThankYouPage.step_3_description: You'll receive your detailed AI impact report within next month via email.
ThankYouPage.step_4_description: Continue receiving monthly reports by participating in our ongoing surveys.
ThankYouPage.important_note_message: Check your email (including spam folder) for your personalized AI career impact report. Make sure to add our email to your contacts for future reports.
ThankYouPage.share_message: Help others understand AI's impact on their careers:

HomePage.main_description: Get monthly insights on how AI is transforming your industry and career path. Our data-driven reports help professionals stay ahead of the AI revolution through comprehensive industry analysis.
HomePage.participation_note: Receive detailed monthly reports by participating in our industry survey
HomePage.how_it_works_description: We follow the give-and-receive framework to ensure high-quality, relevant data for everyone
HomePage.step_1_description: Share your AI usage and career insights through our comprehensive monthly survey
HomePage.step_2_description: Your responses help create the most accurate industry-wide AI impact database
HomePage.step_3_description: Get personalized monthly reports on AI trends affecting your specific career and location
HomePage.features_description: Industry-leading insights backed by real professional experiences
HomePage.feature_data_accuracy_description: Our give-and-receive model ensures authentic, real-world data from practicing professionals across industries.
HomePage.feature_real_time_description: Monthly updates capture the rapidly evolving AI landscape, giving you the most current industry intelligence.
HomePage.feature_personalized_description: Get targeted insights for your specific role, industry, and location - not generic career advice.
HomePage.final_cta_title: Ready to Access Premium AI Career Intelligence?
HomePage.final_cta_description: Join thousands of professionals who receive monthly AI impact reports tailored to their career and industry.

SurveyPage.hero_description: Help us create the most accurate AI career impact data by sharing your experience. You'll receive a detailed personalized report in return.
SurveyPage.step_2_subtitle: How do you use AI in your work?
SurveyPage.ai_activities_label: What activities do you normally use AI for?
SurveyPage.ai_usage_frequency_label: How often do you use AI tools in your daily work?
SurveyPage.ai_usage_daily: Daily - I use AI tools every workday
SurveyPage.ai_usage_weekly: Weekly - I use AI tools several times per week
SurveyPage.ai_usage_monthly: Monthly - I use AI tools occasionally
SurveyPage.ai_usage_rarely: Rarely - I barely use AI tools
SurveyPage.ai_usage_never: Never - I don't use AI tools at work
SurveyPage.ai_helpfulness_label: How helpful has AI been for your work this month?
SurveyPage.ai_helpfulness_very_helpful: Very helpful - Significantly improved my productivity
SurveyPage.ai_helpfulness_not_helpful: Not helpful - Caused more problems than solutions
SurveyPage.ai_tools_used_label: Which AI tools do you currently use in your work?
SurveyPage.most_used_ai_tool_label: What is your most frequently used AI tool?
SurveyPage.select_most_used: Select your most used AI tool
SurveyPage.ai_impact_on_job_label: How would you describe AI's overall impact on your job performance?
SurveyPage.ai_impact_very_positive: Very positive - AI has greatly enhanced my capabilities
SurveyPage.ai_impact_positive: Positive - AI has improved my work in several ways
SurveyPage.ai_impact_neutral: Neutral - AI hasn't significantly changed my work
SurveyPage.ai_impact_negative: Negative - AI has created challenges for me
SurveyPage.ai_impact_very_negative: Very negative - AI has significantly hindered my work
SurveyPage.years_experience_label: Years of Experience in Your Field
SurveyPage.ai_training_label: What type of AI training have you received?
SurveyPage.future_concerns_label: What is your biggest concern about AI's future impact on your career?
SurveyPage.additional_comments_placeholder: Share any additional thoughts about AI's impact on your work or industry...
SurveyPage.submit_success: Thank you! Your survey has been submitted successfully.
SurveyPage.submit_error: There was an error submitting your survey. Please try again.

hero.subtitle: We're building the world's most comprehensive AI career impact platform, helping professionals navigate the future of work with confidence and clarity.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the most accurate, comprehensive, and actionable insights about AI's impact on careers, empowering professionals to make informed decisions about their future in an AI-driven world.

dataInsights.title: Data-Driven Insights
dataInsights.description: We collect and analyze real-world data from professionals across industries to provide accurate career intelligence.

democratized.title: Democratized Access
democratized.description: We make premium career intelligence accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or resources.

futureReady.title: Future-Ready Skills
futureReady.description: We help professionals identify and develop the skills needed to thrive in an AI-enhanced workplace.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every professional has the knowledge and tools they need to thrive alongside AI, creating a future where human potential is amplified, not replaced.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do and every decision we make.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in open, honest communication about our methods, data sources, and findings.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: We are committed to providing the most reliable and precise career intelligence possible.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.description: We ensure our platform serves professionals from all backgrounds, industries, and regions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously push the boundaries of what's possible in career intelligence and AI research.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We protect our users' data with the highest security standards and ethical practices.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We focus on empowering professionals with knowledge and tools to shape their own futures.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: How we started and where we're headed in the journey to democratize AI career intelligence.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: We noticed that while everyone was talking about AI's impact on jobs, there was no reliable, comprehensive data source for professionals to understand how AI would actually affect their specific careers.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: We developed the give-and-receive framework: professionals share their real AI experiences, and in return, they get access to the most comprehensive AI career impact database ever created.

impact.title: The Impact
impact.description: Today, we're helping thousands of professionals make informed career decisions, and we're just getting started. Our vision is to create a global resource that empowers careers in the age of AI.

technology.title: How We Do It
technology.subtitle: The technology and methodology behind our AI career intelligence platform.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We gather real-world data from professionals across industries through our comprehensive surveys and partnerships.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Our advanced AI algorithms analyze patterns, trends, and correlations in career impact data.

insights.title: Insights Generation
insights.description: We transform raw data into actionable insights and personalized recommendations for professionals.

cta.title: Join the Future of Career Intelligence
cta.description: Be part of the movement that's helping millions of professionals navigate the AI revolution. Your experience matters, and together, we're building a better future of work.

ResultsPage.title: Your AI Career Assessment Results
ResultsPage.no_results: No assessment results found. Please take the assessment first.
ResultsPage.assessment_means_bio: Based on your responses, we've analyzed how likely your job role is to be affected by AI automation:
ResultsPage.next_steps_bio: Here are some strategies to help you stay ahead in the age of AI:
ResultsPage.skill_development_bio: Focus on building skills that are difficult to automate, such as critical thinking, creativity, and emotional intelligence.
ResultsPage.ai_literacy_bio: Learn about AI capabilities and limitations to better understand how you can work alongside AI tools.
ResultsPage.career_pivoting_bio: Consider related fields that require more human judgment and complex decision-making abilities.
ResultsPage.continuous_learning_bio: Stay updated with industry trends and be proactive about learning new technologies.
ResultsPage.newsletter_description: Subscribe to receive weekly updates and daily tips to help you stay ahead of AI in your industry.
ResultsPage.consent_text: I agree to receive career tips and industry updates by email.
ResultsPage.newsletter_success: Thank you for subscribing! You'll start receiving career tips soon.
ResultsPage.newsletter_error: There was an error with your subscription. Please try again.
ResultsPage.get_full_insights_title: Enter Your Email to Get Personalized Recommendations
ResultsPage.get_full_insights_description: Based on your assessment results, we've prepared valuable insights specifically for you. To receive your personalized recommendations, next steps, and ongoing industry updates, please provide your email address below.
ResultsPage.detailed_recommendations: Custom recommendations tailored to your assessment results
ResultsPage.industry_trends: Regular updates on AI trends affecting your career field
ResultsPage.skill_development: Opportunities to develop competitive skills in your industry
ResultsPage.career_strategies: Strategic advice to navigate your career in the age of AI
ResultsPage.thank_you_message: We've received your information. Your personalized recommendations and AI career insights will be sent to your email shortly.

risk_explanations.high_risk: This suggests your current role contains many tasks that could be automated by AI in the coming years.
risk_explanations.moderate_risk: This indicates that while some aspects of your job may be automated, your human expertise will remain valuable.
risk_explanations.low_risk: This suggests your role requires uniquely human capabilities that AI will find difficult to replicate.

messages.high_risk_message: Your job has many characteristics that make it susceptible to AI automation.
messages.moderate_risk_message: Parts of your job may be automated, but human expertise will likely remain valuable.
messages.low_risk_message: Your job involves many elements that are difficult for AI to replicate.
messages.no_answers: We couldn't determine your AI replacement risk because no questions were answered.

tips.try_answering: Try answering the questions to get a personalized assessment.
tips.high_risk_tip_1: Focus on developing skills that AI currently struggles with, like creative problem-solving and emotional intelligence.
tips.high_risk_tip_2: Learn how to use AI tools to enhance your productivity rather than compete with them.
tips.high_risk_tip_3: Consider transitioning to roles that require more human judgment and interpersonal skills.
tips.high_risk_tip_4: Stay updated on AI developments in your field to anticipate changes.
tips.high_risk_tip_5: Pursue continuous education in emerging technologies to remain relevant.
tips.moderate_risk_tip_1: Identify which aspects of your role are most vulnerable to automation and which require uniquely human skills.
tips.moderate_risk_tip_2: Learn to collaborate effectively with AI tools to increase your productivity and value.
tips.moderate_risk_tip_3: Develop your expertise in areas where human judgment and creativity add the most value.
tips.moderate_risk_tip_4: Build skills in managing and interpreting AI outputs rather than producing what AI can generate.
tips.moderate_risk_tip_5: Focus on relationship-building and complex problem-solving that AI cannot easily replicate.
tips.low_risk_tip_1: While your job is less likely to be fully automated, use AI tools to handle routine aspects and focus on high-value work.
tips.low_risk_tip_2: Stay ahead by learning how AI can complement your skills and make you more effective.
tips.low_risk_tip_3: Develop expertise in directing and managing AI systems to further enhance your value.
tips.low_risk_tip_4: Continue strengthening uniquely human capabilities like empathy, creativity, and adaptability.
tips.low_risk_tip_5: Mentor others in how to adapt to technological changes within your field.

EmailModal.title: Get Exclusive AI Career Reports
EmailModal.description: Enter your details to receive our comprehensive AI career impact reports and stay updated with the latest insights.
EmailModal.nameError: Please enter at least 2 characters for your name
EmailModal.emailError: Please enter a valid email address
EmailModal.privacyText: We respect your privacy and will only send you relevant career insights. You can unsubscribe at any time.
